channel.title: Lost Legacy - Website/Forums Developer Needed!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/f1ijp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MvE81b0.gif?1[/img]
Lost Legacy may be looked upon as a ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth. Unlike many other servers, Lost Legacy is a created for the players. We strive for creating the 'Perfect' server. Our main priority and concern is our players, which is why we're always open to suggestions to improve our game play. Our friendly and helpful staff will always be there to assist you throughout your journey on Lost Legacy. Lost Legacy is not just a 'game' but in fact, it's a where players can come to relax and truly enjoy themselves. We try our absolute best upon providing a fun and safe game playing experience for our players. We're strong, we're confident. We are Lost Legacy.
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img]
A few months ago I started the original Lost Legacy. However shortly after my computer crashed and it would not work. Coincidentally when that happened I had a series of personal events that occurred which did not quite let me repair my computer. Finally, after some time my computer was repaired. Unfortunately, I lost everything that was on it. I tried to get in to communicate with my old partners and as soon as I did they wanted to start a project. So here I am, officially starting up Lost Legacy. Hope you enjoy what you see!
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/xx7ya.png[/img]
Me - Server & Client Evan - Client
[size=24pt][b][u]Some Features:[/u][/b][/size]
*Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor Degrading *Sexy Fullscreen *Sexy Gameframe *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *Skillng Zone *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Unique Content *Full Member System *Unique Clan Chat System *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Fun Killstreak System *Symbol Support *Dicing *Frost Dragons - System *Revenant Cave *Autocasting
[size=24pt][b][u]Media:[/u][/b][/size]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/51t1lh.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5x5uz9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/qrkkfa.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nhlu86.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/5l8kdz.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2z80vnb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/rkow8j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zyldn9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/244xj6c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1199oqs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/jq5l6q.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/33u67tf.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/346qo7a.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/1zwozyb.png[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dslc8p.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/ftf3i9.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/jb74fs.png[/img] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/33ljhiq.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/24gsmd3.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zs31ty.png[/img] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/1se2co.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/10coh35.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/352gccj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hrHfL5z.gif[/img]
Thanks to Aintario for his sprites and client methods. However the sever sided is completely redone. No dupes etc.. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0C0Wk76Gvb4[/youtube]
[size=24pt][b][u]ATTENTION![/u][/b][/size]
The server is almost ready to be hosted. However I am missing some things such as a website/forums developer. We are looking to put together a team of dedicated programmers to achieve a very successful server. Some of the positions available are:
GFX Artist Website/Forums Programmer
If you are interested please post below or PM. Thank you. [/center]

item.title: Lost Legacy - Website/Forums Developer Needed!
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:10, topic:503142”][quote author=TheAmmoBandit link=topic=621367.msg4255549#msg4255549 date=1362691682]

SQL+SQLi

wat

Im a very expirenced website developer i have 5 years expirence so i can develop forums/website.

wat

SQL as in MySQL (databases and such…)
But you already knew that
[/quote]
You said SQL and SQLi. I presume you meant the PHP side as in MySQLi? Or are you advertising yourself as an SQL injector lol[/quote]

I menth the PHP side hha.

I’m not into hacking

I don’t like the chat box when you go resizable :S
I don’t like how pest control has no NPC’s :o
I don’t like some of those interfaces

But other then that… Good job :)!

item.title: Lost Legacy - Website/Forums Developer Needed!
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

hotshot11065:

Im a very expirenced website developer i have 5 years expirence so i can develop forums/website.

Implymenting that uploading a forum software and adding a skin to it is web development.

Nevertheless, I’m pretty impressed about the server.
PM me if you are still searching for a web developer.

The things below are some info;

I know and can use HTML, CSS, PHP, SQL+SQLi, Photoshop, Illustrator and inDesign

My school course atm is Graphical Print Media and Multimedia (mich includes web development)

I’m in my last year and I need a new challenge because I just finished all my work.

Read full topic

[center]

Lost Legacy may be looked upon as a ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth. Unlike many other servers, Lost Legacy is a created for the players. We strive for creating the ‘Perfect’ server.
Our main priority and concern is our players, which is why we’re always open to suggestions to improve our game play. Our friendly and helpful staff will always be there to assist you throughout your journey on Lost Legacy.
